H0.text: Seed plants are the type of plants that human welfare depends greatly on.

H1.text: Mosses are the type of plants human welfare depends greatly on.

H2.text: Ferns are the type of plants that human welfare depends greatly on.

H3.text: Human welfare depends greatly on fertilizer plants.

A4.text: Mosses absorb 6.4 billion ton of carbon annualy, provide different services, including controlling pathogens dangerous for humans, stopping land erosion, improving microclimate, filtering air pollution, and cooling cities.

A5.text: North American tribal people used mosses for diapers, wound dressing, and menstrual fluid absorption.
